title: Automating Content Ideation From TikTok, X and More
client: Automating Content Ideation From TikTok, X and More
excerpt: Learn how we build an AI Agent that conducted market research on TikTok, X, Tavily and more.

featuredImage.alt: Automating Content Ideation From TikTok, X and More

children.text: Learn how we build an AI Agent that conducted market research on user supplied topics and then converted them into high-quality social media scripts.
We used n8n, Tavily, and Apify to curate and create scripts.

techStack.description: Our process automation platform of choice

techStack.description: LLM powered search engine, great for research

title: Conducting In-depth Research with a Click of a Button
client: Conducting In-depth Research with a Click of a Button
excerpt: We developed an multi-agent flow that conducts in-depth research on topics and individuals.

featuredImage.alt: Conducting In-depth Research with a Click of a Button

children.text: Learn more about the multi-agent workflow we developed to help Secret Leaders learn about guests and perform general research all from Notion.
We implemented tools like Notion, n8n, and Tavily to conduct in-depth research

techStack.title: Notion
techStack.description: Served as the backend for the client to manage the system

techStack.title: n8n Automations
techStack.description: We were able to link various tools including custom HTTP requests

techStack.description: An LLM powered search engine great for research

techStack.title: Firecrawl
techStack.description: Enables scraping website content in plaintext

results.description: Results were typically displayed within 3 minutes.
Create reports, list resources and more.
The automation was optimised to reduce hallucinations.

title: Creating Accessible Content for a Diverse Audience
client: Creating Accessible Content for a Diverse Audience
excerpt: Discover how we helped Aktarr reach their target audience with swift and accurate translations.

featuredImage.alt: Creating Accessible Content for a Diverse Audience

children.text: Discover how our innovative no-code solutions have empowered Aktarr to streamline their operations and enhance productivity. This case study highlights the remarkable journey and outcomes achieved through our tailored automation strategies.
We combined Notion, n8n and Apify to curate and create high-quality content.

techStack.title: Notion backend
techStack.description: The client can now easily manage their flow from their mobile phone on notion

techStack.title: n8n Automations
techStack.description: We built the flow with n8n, split into the article finder and article writer

techStack.title: Custom HTTP
techStack.description: We created an efficient setup to trigger an Apify scraper using custom HTTP requests

techStack.title: Apify scraper
techStack.description: We configured an Apify scraper that can login and auto-refresh the cookies

results.description: We were able to generate 40 high quality articles per hour in Arabic.
The client has gone form spending whole days writing articles to 1h per day for 20.
It only requires a few mins of proof reading to publish each article.

seo.metaTitle: Creating Accessible Content for a Diverse Audience | Case Study

results.description: Data processing time was significantly reduced.
